author: Connie Loizos
title: Marc Andreessen’s call to arms: build something meaningful
description: It’s scary, living with a killer virus that we can’t yet destroy and that has completely upended our lives for who knows how long. It’s very easy to feel helpless in the face of it all, to throw up one’s hands. Don’t do this, says Marc Andreessen in thoughtfu…
content:
It’s scary, living with a killer virus that we can’t yet destroy and that has completely upended our lives for who knows how long. It’s very easy to feel helpless in the face of it all, to throw up one’s hands.
Don’t do this, says Marc Andreessen in thoughtf… [+3214 chars]
